meeting_request.purpose: Feeling lost and overwhelmed in my first-year physics course
meeting_request.description: Hi, I’m Richard, a first-year student in the physics major. I’ve been attending class regularly but still feel like I’m not understanding what we’re doing. Some of the topics we’re covering, like quantum mechanics or astrophysics, are really complex and abstract, and I’m still not sure if I’m making sense. I’m also experiencing academic burnout. I’ve been working hard in class, but I’m also feeling exhausted and overwhelmed by the material. I’m not sure if I should be in this course or if I should be taking something else, but I’m not sure what to do. I’m reaching out because I’m feeling lost and unsure if I’m even doing well in this major.
